meanings.definition: Agreements or treaties between individuals or groups.
meanings.sent1: The pacta between the two countries ensured peace for many years.
meanings.sent2: The pacta signed by the leaders outlined the terms of cooperation.
meanings.sent3: The pacta between the siblings stated they would share their toys.
meanings.sent4: Their pacta was as strong as a chain, binding them together in friendship.
meanings.sent5: The pacta between the neighbors was like a bridge connecting their houses.

meanings.definition: Promises or commitments made between parties.
meanings.sent1: She made a pacta with her friend to always support each other.
meanings.sent2: Their pacta to meet every Friday for coffee was never broken.
meanings.sent3: The pacta between the students was to always share their snacks.
meanings.sent4: Their pacta of honesty shone brightly in their friendship.
meanings.sent5: The pacta between them was a shield against any doubts or fears.
